title: Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706: The BidiUtil class in win32 is using Class.forName() method.
OB: The BidiUtil class in win32 is using Class.forName() method.
EB: The BidiUtil class in win32 should not use Class.forName() method.
SR: To fix this bug, change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4); This change should provide the same functionality as using Class.forName().
